resources.string: Please fill all the required fields.
Your response has been locked in our system.

MNC Pro trades need to access to the following.

Media & Storage
Allowing MNC Pro Trade to access your gallery files enables you to share product images. 

Phone Contact 
It allows us to read the your phone contact and upload it our server.

Don't worry These are standard permission and MNC Pro Trade would not use to access any other use that mentioned.

Are you agree to share your contact with the application.
